DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : SOUTH_KOREA
DOC.TEXT: Seoul Rejects U.S. Demand for Tariff Cuts : The government said the terms for vehicle imports are already better than for the European Union . A trade ministry official , speaking at the end of three days of bilateral trade talks , said Seoul has no intention of cutting_rates from the current 10 % , citing EU tariff rates of 11 % to 22 % .
